description_html:
Henrybuilt was founded in 2001 to create the first American kitchen
‘system’. The company’s primary goal is to produce the best kitchen and whole house
furniture and storage systems in the world, based on an ideal combination of system
development, personal tailoring, craft quality and design service. 

The Vertical Bar Block was developed to bring utility to corners and small spaces, zones
that prove challenging in kitchen design. The product includes an integrated electrical
outlet, providing space for phone charging that keeps cords out of the way – as well as
tailored storage for cutting boards, wine bottles, cooking tools, knives and trays. The
Vertical Bar Block frees up valuable drawer space, while providing an additional
aesthetic dimension. It can be specified in two heights – counter height and full height.
The Vertical Bar Block advances the “tool box” concept introduced through the
company’s original Bar Block, but offers greater flexibility in how it can be programmed
and allows users to reconfigure it as their needs evolve. Henrybuilt’s systems approach
to product design ensures a built-in level of aesthetic refinement, regardless of how the
piece is configured. The Vertical Bar Block is hand made in Seattle using Paperstone and veneer core plywood.
